revision.revremark: New file, based on TSU Diesel file
Updated Outputs definition to new format
Promoted Extended Function Map to the default
Adjusted after creation of Tsunami2 defintions
Separate ECO CVs for Light Effects
Add ID CV 253,254,255,256 and change product ID to values in CV256
Change product ID to values in CVs 253(high byte) and 256(low byte)
Changes based on V1.5 tech ref
Separate ECO CVs file for Extended Function Map. Add labels to Extended Function map CVs. CV287/288 default 255 (disabled)

family.name: Econami Diesel
family.comment: These are the -retail- version Econami Diesel decoders

variable.tooltip: Controls how the engine RPMs interact with the speed step setting of the throttle
variable.label: Engine Notch Rate

variable.tooltip: When this option AND manual (notching) engine control is enabled, locomotive will not move until engine starts
variable.label: Engine RPM Interlock

variable.tooltip: Determines whether prime mover will start up automatically or manually
variable.label: Engine Auto Start Enable

variable.comment: For all models except Gas Turbine and Genset
variable.tooltip: Controls how the dynamic brakes interact with the engine RPMs
variable.label: Dynamic Brake Override

variable.tooltip: Selects which airhorn to use
variable.label: Airhorn Select

variable.tooltip: Choose an alternate airhorn or a short blast of the primary airhorn
variable.label: Auxiliary Airhorn Select

variable.tooltip: Bell sound effect and ring-rate
variable.label: Bell Select

variable.tooltip: Select one of five prime mover sound effects
variable.label: Prime Mover Select

variable.tooltip: Select one of two air compressor sound effects
variable.label: Air Compressor Select

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the airhorn
variable.label: Airhorn Volume

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the prime mover
variable.label: Prime Mover Volume

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the air compressor
variable.label: Air Compressor Volume

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the dynamic brakes
variable.label: Dynamic Brake Volume

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the radiator fans
variable.label: Radiator Fans Volume

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the air reservoir poppet valve releasing
variable.label: Air Tank Poppet Valve Volume

variable.tooltip: Adjust the duration that occurs between each subsequent pop! of the automatic poppet valve sound effect
variable.label: Poppet Valve Release Rate

variable.tooltip:
adjusts the track Voltage in analog mode at which the engine exhaust sound begins
calculated as: Starting Voltage = CV 219 10 + 5V
variable.label: Analog Mode Engine Start Voltage (0-255)
Brake
